name: Brandpoint
tag_list: content-marketing-strategy, content-marketing, blog-writers, content-sydication, infographic-distribution, mat-release
overview:
Brandpoint®, the industry leader in content-based marketing solutions, began life 15 years ago as Article Resource Association, providing copyright-free content to print media across the country. As the digital marketing field evolved, the company maintained its front-runner position by developing new content-based marketing tools and utilizing emerging technologies for a broad portfolio of public relations industry, corporate and nonprofit clients. Today, Brandpoint is recognized as a pioneer in content-based digital marketing and real-time reporting of measurable, effective results, while still providing essential content services to publishers.

•We’ve been helping major brands tell their story since 1996.

•Our client portfolio includes hundreds of the nation’s leading agencies, SEO firms and brands.

•The average writer at Brandpoint has more than 10 years of experience working in journalism, public relations or marketing.
